entries: You've dedicated your life to unraveling the secrets of the ancient Shory Empire, either through meticulous research or by traveling into dangerous and distant ruins to track down longlost artifacts.
Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Dexterity or Intelligence, and one is a free ability boost.
You're trained in the {@skill Crafting} skill and the {@skill Lore||Shory Lore} skill. You gain the {@feat Specialty Crafting} skill feat.
